name: The Phantom Knights of Tomb Shield
text: Special Summon this card in Attack Position as a Normal Monster (Warrior-Type/DARK/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 0). (This card is NOT treated as a Trap Card.) During your turn, except the turn this card was sent to the Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard, then target 1 face-up Trap Card your opponent controls; negate its effects until the end of this turn.
